Html:
Rawr 5 has been working pretty well so far .. but suddenly I can no longer reliably load character data from battle.net

The items/enchants seem load OK, but the DPS is calculated to 0.0 ... 

"Manually" creating a character from new seems to work - and can be saved to XML and reloaded, so this is a reasonable stop-gap

If you want to check, my char is Christost @ Bronzebeard EU  ..... http://eu.battle.net/wow/en/character/bronzebeard/Christost/advanced

Update:

This could be related to the choice of "Tier 6" talents.

"Invocation" calculates properly

"Rune of Power" sends DPS to 0.0

"Incanter's Shield"  sends DPS to 0.0

Sorry for not getting back to you sooner. There's a bug in there, as a workaround try checking Disable Mana Regen Cycles under Spells & Buffs in options and see if that helps. In either case the current version of Fire is inoperable, so just hang tight until next release.

Hi Kavan - many thanks for your reply and of course all the hard work you contribute to this project :)

Rawr 5.0.1.0 seems to have fixed the loading problem - haven't dug any deeper into the new version yet but if I find anything of note I will let you know!

Best!

BTW: I have emailed you regarding the Rawr 5 Add-in.
